Key Match Events: Rhys Hoskins hit a solo home run against his former teammate Aaron Nola to tie the game in the fifth inning.
Aaron Nola pitched seven innings, giving up only one run.
Post-Match Reflections: Aaron Nola reflected on the home run by Rhys Hoskins, acknowledging Hoskins' ability to hit curveballs and his history of good at-bats.
Nola expressed respect for Hoskins despite now being on opposing teams.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Rhys Hoskins has hit 24 home runs and has 73 RBIs for the Brewers in the 2024 season.
Aaron Nola has pitched 188.1 innings with 183 strikeouts and a 3.54 ERA in the 2024 season.
